name: Yearn, Don't Learn
description:
“NO COSMOS COUPLES ALLOWED!” In response to the infamous COSMOS rule, Studio LRNJJ  (pronounced lernge) decided to create “YEARN, Don’t Learn (YDL),” a dating sim where the player assumes the role of a COSMOS student on the UCSC campus. They have the option to date different characters inspired by the various COSMOS clusters!! 

TL;DR Go to class! Meet new people! Fall in love! Date… but don’t get caught!
